content: this scarf is ideal for everyone a lovely gender-neutral design and an absolute classic - this stitch is very popular because it looks so good requires dk yarn - a 100g ball 4mm or 4 5mm needles size width ~ 5½ on 4mm needles length ~ 40 is a great length for an adult or less for a child a great gift idea **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
